text: The Girl from Leningrad () is a 1941 Soviet adventure movie directed by Viktor Eisymont.Фронтовые подругиФРОНТОВЫЕ ПОДРУГИ It stars Zoya Fyodorova, Mariya Kapustina, and Olga Fyodorina. == Actors == * Zoya Fyodorova as Natasha * Mariya Kapustina as Tamara * Olga Fyodorina as The Cricket * Tamara Alyoshina as Zina * Yekaterina Melentyeva as Shura == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian movies Category:1941 war movies Category:1941 adventure movies Category:Movies about Nazi Germany Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Viktor Eisymont Category:Soviet adventure movies
title: The Girl from Leningrad
